name: Kewlest Horan Klanventures!
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES AND GRAPHIC VIOLENCE/SUBJECT MATTER!!! IF YOU DO NOT THINK THAT IS KEWL, PLEASE DO NOT PLAY!!

kewlest horan klanventures is back!! you might be thinking "i didn't even know it was here to begin with" and honestly, i cannot blame you. the first release kinda flopped.

join norel horan on his quest to confront the biggest threat of them all... homosexuality, which is getting in the way of his brotherly love for his brother niall horan who is his brother. there are the other people in the game like the rest of one direction but they don't matter. 

oh and rohan kishibe is here too!
